why_choose: Why choose this course? Foundational Coursework Research Preparation Conceptual Framework Policy-Relevance Adaptability to Change Interdisciplinary Engagement
what_learn: What you will learn? Establish comprehension and have an in-depth and clear understanding of historical and contemporary global politics, its various actors and institutions. Apply the knowledge in analyzing and bringing creative solutions to complex international issues through cooperation, conflict resolution, diplomacy and creative thinking. Demonstrate critical, analytical, research, problem-solving, self-learning and communication skills required for a range of careers in public and private sectors and also for self-employment. Demonstrate entrepreneurship, innovativeness, and continuous learning. Exhibit dynamism, consultative decision-making, team building and such other leadership qualities. Develop civic sense, inclusiveness, empathy, humility, integrity and display appreciation of diversity, environmental sensitivity and global perspective of issues.
